document_data.mainbody: The '''Blue Wyverns''' were an [[adventuring company]] based in [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, [[Jack Ravenwild]] hired the Blue Wyverns at a pay rate of 500 [[gold pieces]] each to help him recover the [[Sarkonagael]], a [[spellbook]] of [[shadow magic]] from the ancient [[dwarven]] city of [[Sarbreen]] located beneath Ravens Bluff. In Sarbreen, the group fought and defeated a tribe of [[troglodyte]]s who were in service to a [[beholder]]. Once they found the book in the [[Temple of the Soulforger]] they had to fight [[Myrkyssa Jelan]]'s gang, the [[Moon Daggers]], for possession of the book.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|2833|8}}

Later, Jack hired the Blue Wyverns to back him up when he delivered a [[Sarkon's umbral simulacrum|shadow simulacrum]] of himself to a [[mage]] who was trying to imprison Jack once again in the [[mythal]] beneath Ravens Bluff.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|3958|11}} Jack hired the group a third time to ambush and capture the notorious [[slave|slaver]] [[Cailek Balathorp|Fetterfist]].{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|4263|13}}
